original: intros m H1 m0 H2. unfold mpl_compat_7_def in *. intros c pl l H. unfold M2. unfold mpl_compat_7_def in H1, H2. intros c0 pl0 l0 H0. unfold union_mpl_0, union_pl in *. apply H1 with (c:=c) (pl:=pl) (l:=l). apply H with (c:=c0) (pl:=pl0) (l:=l0). auto. auto.
